players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was killed, so Diana or Alice must be the mafia. We should look at who seems most suspicious today."

You: "Since we're all new to this game, I think it's a good idea for us to share our thoughts and discuss what happened last night, without jumping to conclusions about who might be the mafia. Let's work together to figure out what happened."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Let's take a closer look at Diana's accusations before making any decisions. We need more evidence before we can trust her claims about Charlie being the mafia."
Diana: "Alice, why are you defending Charlie? I'm the detective and I investigated him. He is the mafia. The only reason to doubt me is if you are trying to protect him."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate me? That makes no sense when there are only four of us and Bob just died. Alice is right to be skeptical."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
